title: is there a way to remove borders ?
body: title says it all is there a way to remove borders ?

replies.body: the border from being gold last season

Which borders do you speak of? The ranked borders you get for playing ranked games and ending in a league of Silver or above? The borders that appear in game if you play in windowed mode? The borders which appear if you play in 'apparently' borderless windowed mode? The borders between players in the loading screen used as a margin so that it doesn't seem to cramped? The borders in your summoner profiled used for the purpose of visual fidelity?

The term 'borders' is very ambiguous.
